items.title: A 30-year-old AI founder who followed the FIRE movement to build wealth is now the youngest self-made woman billionaire
items.description: Lucy Guo unseated Taylor Swift with her self-made billions.

items.title: Nintendo announces the pre-order date and final U.S. pricing for Switch 2
items.description: Orders had been delayed due to Trump's tariffs.

items.title: America’s nuclear talks with Iran hinge on a 68-year-old billionaire real-estate magnate
items.description: Steve Witkoff has had a close relationship with Trump for many years.

items.title: Genesys CEO: How empathetic AI can scale our humanity during economic uncertainty
items.description: The future of AI isn’t just smart. It’s emotionally intelligent—and it’s good for business.

items.title: Yemen’s Houthi rebels just suffered the single deadliest attack under Trump’s command
items.description: U.S. airstrikes killed 74 people and wounded 171 others.
